name: Block Crush (itch)
description:
Block Crush

Block Crush is a puzzle game that you can play in your spare time!

Crush as many blocks as possible to get a high score!

Scores vary with each situation.

- The more blocks, the higher the score

- CRUSH at the same time

- Sandwich between arrow blocks ... etc.

[How to play]

- Use arrow keys to move the blocks.
